title: M*A*S*H = Mash (Special edition) [DVD]
creator_credit: Aspen Productions, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Ingo Preminger, Leon Ericksen and Robert Altman
brief_description: Hailed as one of the best comedies ever made. Army surgeons during the Korean war develop a lunatic life-style in order to cope with the everyday horrors encountered in a Mobile Army Surgical Hospital. The film mixes slap-stick with tragedy and pokes merciless fun at military pomposity, empty religion and incompetence. It sticks its tongue out at hypocrisy - the same attitudes which made the spin-off television series highly successful. Based on a novel by Richard Hooker.
